sentences.en: All ingredients are readily available from your local store.
sentences.cn: 所有的原料都可以方便地从你当地的商店买到。

sentences.en: Although fatigue shows readily on Carter, he bounces back quickly.
sentences.cn: 卡特虽然容易显出疲劳的样子, 但他恢复得很快.

sentences.en: Boats are readily available to visitors.
sentences.cn: 游客可以很方便地租到船只。

sentences.en: Europeans and Jews do not readily assimilate.
sentences.cn: 欧洲人和犹太人不易同化.

sentences.en: His lecture was readily intelligible to all the students.
sentences.cn: 他的讲课学生们都能轻松地听懂。

sentences.en: I promise all costs will be readily returned.
sentences.cn: 我保证所有的费用会迅速偿还.

sentences.en: Meat taints readily in hot weather.
Most plastics do not readily conduct heat or electricity.
sentences.cn: 大多数塑料不易传热或导电.

sentences.en: Once the principal contradiction is grasped, all problems will be readily solved.
sentences.cn: 一旦抓住了主要矛盾, 一切问题就迎刃而解.

sentences.en: The audience reacted readily to his speech.
sentences.cn: 听众对他的演说立即作出反应.

sentences.en: The components are readily available in hardware stores.
sentences.cn: 这些零件在五金商店容易买到。

sentences.en: The difference between the two is readily discernible.
sentences.cn: 两者之间的差别不难看出.

sentences.en: The document is expressed in terms that are readily understood and agreed.
sentences.cn: 文件用语浅显易懂，让人易于接受。

sentences.en: The information is readily accessible on the Internet.
sentences.cn: 这些信息在因特网上一查就能找到。

sentences.en: These quotations cannot readily be traced to their sources.
sentences.cn: 这些引语很难查出出自何处.

sentences.en: This plant prefers alkaline soil, though it will readily tolerate some acidity.
sentences.cn: 这种植物在酸性土壤中也能生存, 但碱性土壤更加适宜.

sentences.en: Wild boar readily hybridises with the domestic pig.
sentences.cn: 野猪很容易和家猪杂交。

容易地；乐意地；无困难地

phrases.tran_cn: 易接近的；易达到的；可存取的

trans.tran_cn: 乐意地，快捷地，轻而易举地，便利地，容易地
